extension.summary: Launches LaunchBox in Big Box mode from within PSMC.
extension.disclaimer: For bugs, requests or general questions visit the PSMC-20 Repository on GitHub.
extension.description: Launches LaunchBox in Big Box mode from within PSMC - It will close or minimize PSMC, launch LaunchBox in Big Box mode and when Big Box is exited PSMC will restart or maximize, with the option to run programs pre/post LaunchBox. It works with PSMC or Kodi on Windows platform only.
